record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 800

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 800 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will read the title of the bill for the second time.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
